languages.text: {n}Посетители складывают руки в аквилу и вразнобой произносят молитвы Императору и заверения в своей набожности. Вряд ли слова искренние, но вот благоговение и страх перед вашим гневом выглядят очень достоверно.{/n}

{n}The patrons make the sign of the Aquila and utter discordant prayers to the Emperor and expressions of their piety. The sincerity of their words is doubtful, but their awe and fear of your ire are quite convincing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Посетители складывают руки в аквилу и вразнобой произносят молитвы Императору и заверения в своей набожности. Вряд ли слова искренние, но вот благоговение и страх перед вашим гневом выглядят очень достоверно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The patrons form Aquilas with their hands and utter discordant prayers to the Emperor and expressions of their piety. The sincerity of their words is doubtful, but their awe and fear of your ire are quite convincing.{/n}

{n}The patrons make the sign of the Aquila and utter discordant prayers to the Emperor and expressions of their piety. The sincerity of their words is doubtful, but their awe and fear of your ire are quite convincing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パトロン達はアクィラの印を手で描き、口それぞれに皇帝への祈りと自身の信仰心を表明している。彼らの言葉の信憑性は疑わしいが、あなたの怒りに対して畏敬と恐怖を抱いているのは確かだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patrons make the sign of the Aquila and utter discordant prayers to the Emperor and expressions of their piety. The sincerity of their words is doubtful, but their awe and fear of your ire are quite convincing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パトロン達はアクィラの印を手で描き、口それぞれに皇帝への祈りと自身の信仰心を表明している。彼らの言葉の信憑性は疑わしいが、あなたの怒りに対して畏敬と恐怖を抱いているのは確かだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les clients forment des Aquilas avec leurs mains et expriment leur piété en marmonnant des prières cacophoniques à l'Empereur. Vous doutez de la sincérité de leurs paroles, mais leur admiration et leur crainte face à votre colère sont assez convaincantes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patrons make the sign of the Aquila and utter discordant prayers to the Emperor and expressions of their piety. The sincerity of their words is doubtful, but their awe and fear of your ire are quite convincing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les clients forment des Aquilas avec leurs mains et expriment leur piété en marmonnant des prières cacophoniques à l'Empereur. Vous doutez de la sincérité de leurs paroles, mais leur admiration et leur crainte face à votre colère sont assez convaincantes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有酒客都比着双头鹰手势，七嘴八舌地向帝皇祈祷，表达他们的虔诚。他们的言辞是否真诚令人怀疑，但你的怒火给他们带来的恐惧与敬畏却没有一丝虚假。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patrons make the sign of the Aquila and utter discordant prayers to the Emperor and expressions of their piety. The sincerity of their words is doubtful, but their awe and fear of your ire are quite convincing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有酒客都比着双头鹰手势，七嘴八舌地向帝皇祈祷，表达他们的虔诚。他们的言辞是否真诚令人怀疑，但你的怒火给他们带来的恐惧与敬畏却没有一丝虚假。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Gäste machen das Zeichen des Adlers und beten zum Imperator, um ihrer Frömmigkeit Ausdruck zu verleihen. Ob sie es ernst meinen, ist zweifelhaft, aber die Ehrfurcht und Angst vor deinem Zorn sind durchaus überzeugend.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patrons make the sign of the Aquila and utter discordant prayers to the Emperor and expressions of their piety. The sincerity of their words is doubtful, but their awe and fear of your ire are quite convincing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gäste machen mit ihren Händen das Zeichen des Adlers, beten zum Imperator und äußern ihre Frömmigkeit. Ob sie es ernst meinen, ist zweifelhaft, aber die Ehrfurcht und Angst vor deinem Zorn sind durchaus überzeugend.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los patrones hacen el signo del Aquila y pronuncian rezos discordantes dirigidos al Emperador y expresando su devoción. Dudas de la sinceridad de sus palabras, pero el asombro y temor que provoca en ellos tu ira son bastante convincentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patrons make the sign of the Aquila and utter discordant prayers to the Emperor and expressions of their piety. The sincerity of their words is doubtful, but their awe and fear of your ire are quite convincing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los patrones forman Aquilas con sus manos y pronuncian rezos discordantes dirigidos al Emperador y expresando su devoción. Dudas de la sinceridad de sus palabras, pero el asombro y temor que provoca en ellos tu ira son bastante convincentes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Müşterilerin her biri, Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıp ayrı kafadan İmparator'a dua ederek imanını dışa vuruyor. Söylediklerinde samimi oldukları şaibeli olmakla birlikte hiddetine karşı duydukları korku ve huşu gayet inanılası.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The patrons make the sign of the Aquila and utter discordant prayers to the Emperor and expressions of their piety. The sincerity of their words is doubtful, but their awe and fear of your ire are quite convincing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Müşteriler, Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıp ahenksizce İmparator'a dua ederek imanlarını dışa vuruyor. Söylediklerinde samimi oldukları şaibeli olsa da, hiddetine karşı duydukları korku ve huşu gayet ikna edici.{/n}
